data.title: A Door Curveball Setup to Play off of Teammate in A Main
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective way to play off one of your teammates in A Main to contest that space and make it harder for enemy players to take space inside of A Main.

data.title: B Generator Site Hold / Retake Curveball
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective site hold / retake Curveball that allows you to swing out of a B Generator Smoke.
